page.title: 14FOOD IN BUCKLAND BREWER
page.content: { SPECIAL DAYS { }IN CHURCH AT{CHRISTMAS}THE VICAR GIVES US AN ORANGE WITH A CANDLE IN IT AND LITTLE COLOURED JELLY SWEETS STUCK ON WITH COCKTAIL STICKS.IT HAS A PIECE OF RED TAPE TIED AROUND THE MIDDLE. AT{EASTER} WE HAVE EGGS AND HOT CROSS BUNS AND SOME PEOPLE HAVE SIMNEL CAKE. SOMTIMES EGGS ARE HARD BOILED AND PAINTED IN RED, BLUE AND GREEN. HOT CROSS BUNS ARE SPICY BUNS WITH MARKS ON THEM IN THE SHAPE OF A CROSS. EASTER EGGS ARE HOLLOW CHOCOLATE FILLED WITH SWEETS AND COVERED IN BEAUTIFUL WRAPPERS. ON MY {BIRTHDAY}I HAD A SPECIAL TEA.I HAD,SAUSAGES ON STICKS,SAUSAGE ROLLS,CHEESE,EGG AND TOMATO SANDWICHES,JELLY AND ICE CREAM,FRUIT SALAD,CRISPS,HULA HOOPS AND PEANUTS. MY CAKE HAD PINK ICING WITH EIGHT CANDLES AND AN "8" ON IT.
